程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

类 PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression
直接已知子类:
PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegressionRobust
public class PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression
extends PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract
A VM allocation policy that uses Local Regression (LR) to predict host utilization (load) and define if a host is overloaded or not.
If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package please cite the following paper:
  • Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience (CCPE), Volume 24, Issue 13, Pages: 1397-1420, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd, New York, USA, 2012
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
